parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset to use when retrieving results (useful in pagination)

parameters.name: deleted
parameters.description: Set this to "true" if you want to return only deleted users

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: Set this to "true" if you want both deleted and active users

parameters.name: ldap_import
parameters.description: Whether the user was imported/synched with LDAP - should be 0 or 1

parameters.name: remote
parameters.description: Whether the user is marked as a remote worker or not (should be 0 or 1)

parameters.name: vip
parameters.description: Whether or not the user is marked as a VIP (1 or 0 for true or false, respectively)

remote.description: Whether or not the user is a remote worker

groups.description: ID of the group or groups the user should be associated with. This can be a single ID number, or an array, like [1,2,3]

remote.description: Whether or not the user is a remote worker (0 or 1)

groups.description: ID of the group or groups the user should be associated with. This can be a single ID number, or an array, like [1,2,3]

patch.description: Partially update a user, passing only the fields you want to modify

groups.description: ID of the group or groups the user should be associated with. This can be a single ID number, or an array, like [1,2,3]

get.description: Get a list of assets checked out to the user

parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description: Valid category ID to filter on within the user's assets

parameters.name: model_id
parameters.description: Valid model ID to filter on user's assets

get.description: Get a list of licenses checked out to the user
Get a list of accessories checked out to the user
Get details on the current user accessing the API

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: User ID of a deleted user
